jhelp.gui.game

Interface EventManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    KeyMapper, SnakeFrame

    public interface EventManager
    Event state manager.
    The method actionState(Map, int, int, boolean, boolean, boolean) is called in loop, even if nothing change
    Author:
    JHelp

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean actionState(java.util.Map<ActionKey,java.lang.Boolean> actionsStates, int mouseX, int mouseY, boolean buttonLeft, boolean buttonMiddle, boolean buttonRight)
      Actual action key and mouse state

    • Method Detail

      • actionState

        boolean actionState(java.util.Map<ActionKey,java.lang.Boolean> actionsStates,
                  int mouseX,
                  int mouseY,
                  boolean buttonLeft,
                  boolean buttonMiddle,
                  boolean buttonRight)
        Actual action key and mouse state
        Parameters:
        actionsStates - Action states. Just use actionsStates.get(actionKey) to know a action key status
        mouseX - Mouse X position
        mouseY - Mouse Y position
        buttonLeft - Indicates if mouse button left is down
        buttonMiddle - Indicates if mouse button middle is down
        buttonRight - Indicates if mouse button right is down
        Returns:
        true if key events are consumed
